author: Emily Van de Riet
title: Officers responding to car crash on Christmas find man dressed as the Grinch behind the wheel
text:
EXETER, N.H. (Gray News) – Police in a New Hampshire town were surprised to find the Grinch behind the wheel of a crashed car on Christmas Day.
According to the Exeter Police Department , the “unusual” crash involved a driver dressed as the Grinch who veered off the roadway and struck a sign and a mailbox.
Police responded to the call just before 6 p.m. on Dec. 25. When officers arrived, they found the driver wearing a full Grinch costume.
The 31-year-old driver was uninjured. His vehicle had significant front-end damage along with a smashed windshield and a broken window, police said.
“This was certainly a unique situation,” Exeter Police Chief Stephan Poulin said. “Officers never expected to arrive at the scene to find that an operator was wearing a Grinch suit behind the wheel, but it was Christmas night so not entirely outside the realm of possibility.”

author: Faith Fernandez
title: Discover the Art of Learning at Eliot Arts Magnet! - Pasadena Schools
text:
[Read Previous Post](https://www.pasadenanow.com/pasadenaschools/ramona-convents-pre-med-club-welcomes-nurse-practitioner-for-inspiring-career-talk/)
Discover the Art of Learning at Eliot Arts Magnet!
Eliot Arts Magnet stands as the only public arts school in the San Gabriel Valley specifically designed for middle school students. Located on a picturesque campus in Altadena, Eliot offers an innovative conservatory model that allows students to immerse themselves in various artistic disciplines while integrating the arts into a robust core curriculum. This unique approach fosters creativity, critical thinking, and a deep appreciation for the arts, preparing students for future academic and artistic success.
Families and prospective students are invited to experience the vibrant learning environment firsthand by attending a school tour. Explore the campus, meet the passionate educators, and witness the transformative power of an arts-integrated education.
School Tour Dates:
• December 13, 2024
• January 17, 2025
• February 14, 2025
• March 14, 2025
• April 18, 2025
• May 9, 2025
Tours begin promptly at 8:45 a.m.
Schedule your tour today: [https://eliot.pusd.us/about/about-our-school/school-tours](https://eliot.pusd.us/about/about-our-school/school-tours).
Charles W. Eliot Arts Academy, 2184 North Lake Avenue, Altadena, (626) 396-5680 ext. 70001 or visit [https://eliot.pusd.us/](https://eliot.pusd.us/).

author: Redacción/GH
title: ¡Espectáculo celestial en Baja California! Cómo y dónde ver las Auroras Boreales esta madrugada
text:
¡Espectáculo celestial en Baja California! Cómo y dónde ver las Auroras Boreales esta madrugada
Para obtener la mejor experiencia visual, es importante alejarse de las áreas urbanas y la contaminación lumínica.
Mexicali, B.C.- Hoy, 11 de octubre de 2024, las auroras boreales serán visibles en Baja California debido a una tormenta solar severa que está afectando el campo magnético de la Tierra.
Este fenómeno es bastante inusual para latitudes tan al sur. Desde la madrugada, se han reportado avistamientos en varias zonas de Baja California, con cielos iluminados en colores vibrantes.
Para obtener una mejor visualización, lo ideal es alejarse de las luces de la ciudad y buscar cielos despejados en áreas más rurales.
Aunque es probable que el fenómeno sea visible a simple vista, se recomienda utilizar cámaras para capturar los colores con mayor claridad, ya que los sensores de los dispositivos modernos pueden resaltar mejor los matices que el ojo humano.
Este evento también ha sido presenciado en otros estados del norte de México como Sonora y Chihuahua.
Para apreciar mejor las auroras boreales en Baja California, lo ideal es buscar lugares alejados de la contaminación lumínica y con cielos despejados. Aquí algunas sugerencias:
- Valle de Guadalupe: Conocido por sus viñedos, este valle ofrece cielos despejados y es una excelente opción para observar las auroras en un ambiente tranquilo y rural.
- Sierra de San Pedro Mártir: Esta zona montañosa es una de las mejores opciones debido a su altitud y la baja interferencia de luces artificiales. Además, al ser un área protegida, el ambiente es ideal para la observación astronómica.
- Laguna Hanson: Ubicada en el Parque Nacional Constitución de 1857, este lugar es perfecto por su aislamiento y cielos oscuros, lo que permite una buena visibilidad de las auroras.
- Playas alejadas de Ensenada o Rosarito: Las playas más apartadas, lejos de las zonas turísticas, también pueden ofrecer una buena vista del fenómeno si los cielos están despejados.
- Desierto de Cataviña: Con poca contaminación lumínica, esta área desértica al sur de Baja California también puede ser un buen punto de observación.
Las auroras boreales en Baja California se podrán observar mejor durante las horas de la madrugada del 11 de octubre de 2024, aproximadamente entre la 1:00 a.m. y las 4:00 a.m. Este es el momento en que los cielos suelen estar más oscuros, y la actividad geomagnética estará en su punto máximo. Además, se espera que la tormenta solar continúe por varias horas, lo que permitirá un período prolongado de visibilidad del fenómeno.

author: David
title: The Majestic Gate Of Heaven Church: A Review Of Its Architectural Marvel
text:
St Mary Gate of Heaven 101st ave Queens NY Ozone park, Queens ny, St mary from www.pinterest.com As I walked through the majestic gates of the Gate of Heaven Church, I was filled with awe and wonder at the sheer beauty and magnificence of the structure. Built in the heart of the city, this church is a true testament to the power of architecture and design to awe and inspire. From the intricate details of the facade to the soaring heights of the spires, every inch of this church is a work of art that leaves a lasting impression on all who behold it. In this review, I will take a closer look at the architectural marvel that is the Gate of Heaven Church and explore its many fascinating features and design elements.
Table of Contents
The Facade: A Masterpiece of Gothic Architecture The Interior: A Soaring Space of Light and Color The Bell Towers: A Testament to the Power of Sound The Crypt: A Hidden Gem The Gardens: A Peaceful Oasis The Facade: A Masterpiece of Gothic Architecture One of the most striking features of the Gate of Heaven Church is its stunning facade, which is a masterpiece of Gothic architecture. The facade is composed of three intricately carved portals that are adorned with a variety of religious motifs and symbols, including angels, saints, and scenes from the Bible. The central portal is the largest and most elaborate, with a towering arch that reaches up to the top of the facade. The two smaller side portals are also beautifully detailed, with their own unique carvings and decorations.
The facade is also adorned with a number of other decorative elements, including stained glass windows, gargoyles, and spires. The spires are particularly impressive, with their intricate detailing and soaring heights. The tallest spire reaches up to 120 feet and is topped with a golden cross that shines brilliantly in the sunlight. Overall, the facade of the Gate of Heaven Church is a true masterpiece of Gothic architecture and a testament to the skill and craftsmanship of the architects who designed it.
The Interior: A Soaring Space of Light and Color As impressive as the exterior of the Gate of Heaven Church is, the interior is even more breathtaking. The church is designed in the shape of a cross, with a soaring nave that reaches up to the ceiling. The nave is lined with rows of pews, which are arranged in a semi-circular pattern around the altar. The walls and ceiling of the nave are adorned with a variety of religious paintings and sculptures, which add to the sense of awe and wonder that one feels upon entering the space.
One of the most striking features of the interior is the stained glass windows, which are among the largest and most beautiful in the world. The windows are composed of thousands of individual pieces of glass, which are arranged in intricate patterns and designs. When the sun shines through the windows, the nave is filled with a kaleidoscope of colors that dance across the walls and ceiling. Overall, the interior of the Gate of Heaven Church is a soaring space of light and color that is truly awe-inspiring.
The Bell Towers: A Testament to the Power of Sound Finally, no review of the Gate of Heaven Church would be complete without a mention of its bell towers. The towers are among the tallest in the world, reaching up to 200 feet in height. They are equipped with a variety of bells, which are among the largest and most sonorous in the world. The bells are rung at various times throughout the day, filling the city with their majestic sound and reminding all who hear them of the power and majesty of the divine.
The bell towers are also beautifully decorated, with a variety of carvings and sculptures that add to their grandeur and beauty. The towers are truly a testament to the power of sound and the role that sound can play in inspiring awe and wonder in those who hear it.
The Crypt: A Hidden Gem Another fascinating feature of the Gate of Heaven Church is its crypt, which is located beneath the main altar. The crypt is a hidden gem that is often overlooked by visitors, but it is well worth a visit for those who are interested in history and architecture. The crypt contains a variety of ancient artifacts and relics, including tombs of former bishops and other important figures in the history of the church. It is also beautifully decorated, with intricate carvings and sculptures that add to its sense of mystery and intrigue.
The Gardens: A Peaceful Oasis Finally, the Gate of Heaven Church is surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens that are a peaceful oasis in the heart of the city. The gardens are filled with a variety of plants and flowers, as well as fountains and statues that add to their beauty and serenity. Visitors can stroll through the gardens and enjoy the tranquility of this hidden gem, which is a true testament to the power of nature to inspire and uplift the human spirit.
In conclusion, the Gate of Heaven Church is a true architectural marvel that is sure to inspire and awe all who behold it. From the intricate details of the facade to the soaring heights of the bell towers, every inch of this church is a work of art that leaves a lasting impression on all who visit it. Whether you are interested in history, architecture, or simply in awe of the power and majesty of the divine, the Gate of Heaven Church is a must-see destination that is sure to leave you breathless.
Feature Description The Facade A masterpiece of Gothic architecture composed of three intricately carved portals adorned with religious motifs and symbols. The Interior A soaring space of light and color with stained glass windows, religious paintings, and sculptures. The Bell Towers The tallest in the world with a variety of sonorous bells and beautifully decorated with carvings and sculptures. The Crypt A hidden gem with ancient artifacts and relics, as well as intricate carvings and sculptures. The Gardens Beautifully landscaped gardens surrounding the church with plants, flowers, fountains, and statues.

author: Andrea Dresdale
title: Cher files for conservatorship of son Elijah Blue Allman - Good Morning America
text:
Cher is taking legal steps to help her son, Elijah Blue Allman, who allegedly struggles with substance abuse: She's filed for a conservatorship of him.
In legal documents obtained by ABC News, Cher states that she wants to be the sole conservator of Elijah's estate because she claims he is \"substantially unable to manage his financial resources.\"
According to the documents, Elijah, 47, Cher's son with her late ex-husband, Gregg Allman, is due to receive money from a trust before the end of 2023. However, she claims that because he's currently suffering from \"severe mental health and substance abuse issues,\" according to the filing, Cher believes that \"any money [he] receives will be \"immediately spent on drugs ... putting [his] life at risk.\"
The documents also claim that Cher believes that Elijah's wife, Marieangela King, from whom he filed for divorce in 2021, shouldn't be the conservator because she allegedly is \"not supportive of Elijah's recovery\" and \"actively works to keep Elijah from getting clean and sober or receiving mental health treatment that he desperately needs.\"
Furthermore, the documents state that Cher has \"worked tirelessly\" to get Elijah \"the help he needs,\" and that two of his siblings have nominated her to act as conservator.
It's not clear to which siblings Cher is referring, but the filing lists three of Gregg Allman's five children – including Devon Allman, lead singer of The Allman Betts Band – and Cher's son, Chaz Bono, from her marriage to the late Sonny Bono.
A hearing for a temporary order of conservatorship is set for January 5. A hearing that will decide whether to make the order permanent is set for March 6.
In December 2022, King alleged in court documents, requesting that a hearing pertaining to their divorce be rescheduled, that four people who were allegedly \"hired\" by Cher came to her and Allman's New York City hotel room and \"removed\" Allman from the room. King said that the incident happened the night of Nov. 30, while she and Allman were \"working on our marriage.\"
At the time, King said she was told that she wasn't \"allowed to see or speak to [Allman] who is currently in lockdown at a treatment facility that is undisclosed to me.\"
Cher responded to the allegations in an October 2023 interview with People , declaring \"that rumor is not true.\"
\"Good Morning America\" has reached out to King's lawyer for comment.
